snippet: With David Diehl sidelined six weeks after thumb surgery, Justin Pugh, the team’s No. 1 draft pick, has been penciled in at right tackle for the season opener in Dallas.
abstract: New York Giants offensive lineman Justin Pugh is penciled in at right tackle for season opener against Dallas Cowboys as David Diehl recovers from thumb surgery; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: With David Diehl sidelined six weeks after thumb surgery, Justin Pugh, the team’s No. 1 draft pick, has been penciled in at right tackle for the season opener in Dallas.

headline.main: Injury Forces Giants to Shift Offensive Line Again
headline.print_headline: Injury Forces Shift in Giants’ Line
